alert.note: Alert for Atkinson; Bacon; Coffee; Pierce; Ware (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 14 at 2:50PM EDT until June 14 at 3:30PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Jacksonville has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern Coffee County in southeastern Georgia... West central Pierce County in southeastern Georgia... Northern Atkinson County in southeastern Georgia... North central Ware County in southeastern Georgia... Southwestern Bacon County in southeastern Georgia... * Until 330 PM EDT. * At 250 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 6 miles north of Willacoochee to near Dixie Union, and are moving south at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Bickley. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
